content: ध्यात, ध्यान, ध्यानिक &c. See under ध्यै.

ध्यान [ध्यै-भावे-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Meditation, reflection, thought, contemplation; ज्ञानाद् ध्यानं विशिष्यते <ls>Bg. 12. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 12</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 72.</ls> {@--2@} Especially, abstract contemplation, religious meditation; तदैव ध्यानादवगतोऽस्मि <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 73.</ls> {@--3@} Divine intuition or discernment. {@--4@} Mental representation of the personal attributes of a deity; इति ध्यानं.
